item.description: %% Status:: #in-progress %% Category:: #obsidian Tags:: #term #obsidian #knowledge-management Links:: ğŸ“‡ Glossary ![ğŸ–‡ Attachments/obsidian-logo.png] Definition Obsidian is a naturally occurring volcanic glass formed when lava extruded from a volcano cools rapidly with minimal crystal growth.
